sense.def:
The separation of two or more people or things
je oddaljitev dveh ali več oseb ali stvari oziroma stanje, ko niso skupaj.

A separation between two or more people
je čas, ko dve ali več oseb niso skupaj.

seg.quote: Children recover remarkably quickly from a brief separation from their parents.
The Muslim minority are seeking separation from Georgia.

sense.def:
To have a separation
pomeni, da se zakonca odločita, da bosta živela ločeno.

seg.quote: Last night we talked about a separation.
